msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your I just can't stop starin' at it. It's likeit's breakin' my brain or something, .Y'know, I heard if you stare at something too long, you'll drill holes in it, but that's not true<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />right?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Gotta say, I'm a fan of your there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Not that I'm askin' to borrow it or nothin'. I like it where it is just fine. I can come see it whenever I want!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, why would someone stick there?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Was it to get my attention? 'Cause they've definitely got it, so Now what, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This looks SUPER comfy and soft, but<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I'm such a hardcore toss-'n-turner that I'd probably flop myself out anyway, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, know what'd rock?<20_3 arg="6" /> Gettin' everyone together to watch some action flicks!!<20_2 arg="3" /> Then we could try out some of those sweet, sweet slo-mo moves!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is wicked sweet!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Hey, got any good thrash-metal albums, ? I wanna get my blood pumpin'!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I gotta say, whoever put here? Rock star.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Now when I'm out late, , I'll know when that pesky sun's gonna pop over the horizon!
You just can't beat the air here! It's like, turbo--fresh.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is totally made to love it too! Just look!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! Takin' a bath under the stars sounds like it'd be AMAZING!Oh, uh<20_2 arg="3" />exceptthere's no way I'd ever do that where everyone can see. , scratch that idea.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Huh? Is someone wantin' to study under the sky or something?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Seems like a cool ideauntil it starts to rain, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whenever I see a chair outside, <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I gotta figure someone thought the view from there rocked pretty hard.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Someone planning a concert with their or something, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Who here even knows how to play ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I get this weird urge to do a huge cook-off thing every time I stroll by .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Think anybody else would want in on that, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, nice! I've been meaning to get my hands on !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Well, nobody else is here, so Don't mind if I do, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I mean, this is just outdoorsy stuff outdoors, . What's the big deal?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I will say this though, that is definitely a rockin' spot for .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's been real nice having here.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Well, except for the other night when a moth flew into my mouth as I was walkin' by, Yuck.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Alright, who stuck here?<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I'm just asking 'cause sometimes I'm clumsy, and seven years of bad luck is a lot, .
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I don't get having here<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Like, are we supposed to change clothes outside? 'Cause I'm not cool with that, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, who did it? Who left here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />'Cause I slipped earlier and came THIS close to squishing the poor thing, . Not cool!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Are we doing outdoor exhibits now? 'Cause if not, then what's up with ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess doing exhibits out here makes sense, 'cause I'm spotting totally new details right now.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Picture it. You're in dinosaur times or whatever, climb up a hill, and you see .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I bet that'd be rad! And maybe scary too. But mostly rad, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is it really a good idea to stick here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not an art curator or whatever, butwhat if it rains, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow I just can't get over this .<20_3 arg="3" />The detail is bonkers. Like, no matter how close you look, there's still more to see, .<20_3 arg="6" /> That's wild!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Even I can tell someone messed with this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But you know what? I don't care. I get that it's famous, but who says you can't improve on a classic?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why would someone stick outside?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whatever! As long as I'm not the one paying the power bill, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What's up with having here?<20_3 arg="6" />Is it a pet? Did someone lose it? <20_3 arg="3" />Oh! Maybe it's an explorer, and this is like a submarine trip for it!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! Check out the total rock star in this photo. Yeah, I bet nobody messes with her, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />She's seriously gotta be the coolest I've ever seen. Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Cool !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I loved playing with those when I was little. Well, except for the part where I kept breaking 'em,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Those rock! I used to have fun with 'em for hours, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love that there's just here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That kind of stuff is what makes feel like home!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That's brave. I wouldn't leave here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Better be waterproof, is all I'm sayin', .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Huh! I see we got ourselves here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Might make for a good meetup spot. On cold days, I'll wait forever, but on hot ones, it's like, "Where are you?!"You get me, ?

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />OK, why would someone leave there?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's a classic that deserves better than getting left out in the rain! Well, it's not mine, sowhatever, I guess.

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I'm torn. On the one hand, that flower looks really happy.On the other, it's outside. It oughta be in the ground.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Actually, you know what? Ignore me. That flower's happy, and that's all that matters, !
Is it me, or is it weird to put there?But it's a good weird. Like a painting that might be if you squint hard enough!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />It's kinda comforting to see there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's good to know I'm not the only one who leaves their clothes just wherever, . Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I really wonder who lost their <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, not a lot of folks bother with footwear around here, .
